lore: Deadly and precise, Xayah is a vastayan revolutionary waging a personal war to save her people. She uses her speed, guile, and razor-sharp feather blades to cut down anyone who stands in her way. Xayah fights alongside her partner and lover, Rakan, to protect their dwindling tribe, and restore their race to her vision of its former glory.
title: the Rebel
blurb: Deadly and precise, Xayah is a vastayan revolutionary waging a personal war to save her people. She uses her speed, guile, and razor-sharp feather blades to cut down anyone who stands in her way. Xayah fights alongside her partner and lover, Rakan, to...
allytips: Xayah's attacks and abilities leave Feathers on the ground that she can later recall for massive area damage and control.
Xayah can use Featherstorm to dodge almost any ability while also creating a ton of Feathers. Try to utilize the offensive and defensive aspects of this ability.

passive.name: Clean Cuts
passive.description: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.
passive.sanitizedDescription: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.

enemytips: Xayah's Bladecaller will only root targets hit by 3 or more returning Feathers.
Long fights in the same area with Xayah will allow her to drop a lot of Feathers. Try to stay on the move!
Make sure you are ready when you go for the kill. Untargetability from Featherstorm can quickly turn an ambush in Xayah's favor.
name: Xayah

spells.name: Double Daggers
spells.description: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
spells.tooltip: Xayah throws two knives dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage and leaving two Feathers. Targets hit after the first take {{ e2 }}% damage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Xayah throws two knives dealing {{ f1 }} (+{{ f2 }}) physical damage and leaving two Feathers. Targets hit after the first take {{ e2 }}% damage.

spells.name: Deadly Plumage
spells.description: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.
spells.tooltip:
Xayah creates a storm of blades for {{ e2 }} seconds that grant her {{ e1 }}% attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for {{ e5 }}% damage.

If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, allies under the effects of Deadly Plumage gain {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds.

If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Xayah creates a storm of blades for {{ e2 }} seconds that grant her {{ e1 }}% attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for {{ e5 }}% damage. If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, allies under the effects of Deadly Plumage gain {{ e3 }}% movement speed for {{ e4 }} seconds. If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage.

spells.name: Bladecaller
spells.description: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
spells.tooltip:
Xayah calls all Feathers back to her, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f4 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through (Increased by Critical Strike Chance).

Hitting an enemy with {{ e5 }} Feathers roots them for {{ e4 }} second.

Minions take {{ e2 }}% damage from Bladecaller.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Xayah calls all Feathers back to her, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f3 }}) (+{{ f4 }}) physical damage to enemies they pass through (Increased by Critical Strike Chance). Hitting an enemy with {{ e5 }} Feathers roots them for {{ e4 }} second. Minions take {{ e2 }}% damage from Bladecaller.

spells.name: Featherstorm
spells.description: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
spells.sanitizedDescription: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
spells.tooltip:
Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable. She then rains down daggers which deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and leave behind a line of Feathers.

Xayah can move while in the air.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable. She then rains down daggers which deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and leave behind a line of Feathers. Xayah can move while in the air.
